useMockData.description: Whether or not to use mock data instead of the real tracker API. If true, pulls from Lange's Dropbox.

displayDuration.description: How long (in seconds) most things show on-screen for.

address.description: The IP address or hostname of a Behringer X32 digital mixer.

userId.description: The numeric userid of the Twitter account that owns these API keys. http://mytwitterid.com/

serialCOMName.description: The COMName of the serial port to communicate timekeeping info with. Used with TestRunner's timerbox.

streamTitle.description: The template used to set the title of the stream whenever the current run changes.

tracker.description: Login information for the private areas of the tracker API.

obsWebsocket.description: Login information for OBS Websocket, used to communicate with and remotely control OBS Studio.
